name: Jaculus
author: Levi
desc:
A ball of serpentine spirits become infused into your body for a short time, bringing with them the violent energy of a storm at sea.

For the duration of the spell, whenever you make a ranged weapon attack that launches one or more projectiles, one of the spirits enters each projectile and infuses it, increasing the speed and intensity of each shot. Your ranged weapon attacks that launch projectiles have their range doubled, ignore partial cover, and make no sound as they travel.
